title: Import NthLayer dashboard to Grafana Cloud
description: Run 'nthlayer apply examples/services/payment-api.yaml' and import generated dashboard to Grafana Cloud. Make dashboard public.

comments.author: robfox
comments.text: Dashboard generated at generated/dashboards/payment-api.json - 12 panels including SLO gauges, service health metrics, and PostgreSQL monitoring. Ready to import to Grafana Cloud.

comments.author: robfox
comments.text: Switching to auto-push approach (--push-grafana flag). User chose Option A to demonstrate full zero-toil automation. Need Grafana Cloud credentials to proceed.
